owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment:
An Ontology to model metric Unit of Measure information. This ontology models the house Units of Measure preferred for each metric collected in Perspectum biomedical studies. To be used initially in support of an ontology of metrics collected in a clinical study of multi-organ imaging of patients exhibiting symptoms of long Covid.
Perspectum has published a longitudinal, observational clinical study (Dennis et al, 2020) of patients, still experiencing symptoms 3 months post-infection, with acute SARS-CoV-2. Patients were assessed with health questionnaires, blood investigations and quantitative magnetic resonance imaging (MRI).
Dennis, A. et al. (2020) ‘Multi-organ impairment in low-risk individuals with long COVID’, medRxiv, p. 2020.10.14.20212555. doi: 10.1101/2020.10.14.20212555.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Within Perspectum, this relationship defines the types of metric collected in studies with a specific unit of measure as its default .
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has default unit of measure

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Within Perspectum, this relationship defines the default unit of measure for a specific type of metric collected in studies.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is default unit for metric type

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A unit from the QUDT units of measure ontology.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: QUDT unit

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The default unit of measure for this type of metric in Perspectum study data.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: default UoM

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of metric being collected, eg. Liver PDFF, patient BMI.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: metric type
